1530290.name: Nonestory P1
1530290.description:
We have:
  • Non-unique combat system
  • Unoriginal play style
(* so that's where the name comes from)]

But:
  • Original story
  • Expressive dialogues designed to cheer you up
  • Unexpected meetings
  • And something else, because I could not think of anything else

In the course of the game, you will learn the unusual history of the existence of a another world, into which you yourself find yourself, having shown imprudence.
A relaxing and friendly atmosphere awaits you, as well as a touching denouement filled with battles with opponents and friends.

I hope you enjoy it.
